title: Your Health Buddy
description: A full stack MERN web application, with authentication, which helps you to make workout plans, keep track of them and gain isngihts. REST API at backend and React/Typescipt interface at frontend.

title: FilmCave
description: An AI buddy with whom you can discuss about any movie without sending questions to server. Runs a light-weight BERT Machine Learning model on local browser and built using NextJs. Hosted on vercel.

title: CommFind
description: A web solution to help members of community find their lost items. Used ReactJs for front-end interface and hosted the back-end on AWS using S3 buckets for storage and automatically triggered AWS functions for pre-processing

title: Privacy Screenshot
description: A simple to use GUI tool for windows for taking privacy focused snapshots by automatically cropping sensitive parts like tabs and taskbar. Built using Python and OpenCV library for image recognition.
